Introduction
This topic contains information about controls for responses to VA requests for evidence, including
time limit for responding to a request
next steps after sending a request for evidence
incomplete responses that justify award action
situations warranting extension of the 30-day time limit
what an extension of the 30-day time limit does not affect
situations that do not warrant extension of the 30-day time limit
, and
authority to take the next claim action after erroneous development is identified
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section D - Evidence Requested From the Claimant
citation: Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section D
